info.name: Comfortable Dark Mode - Excludes Lists
info.additionalInfo:
Big thanks and credit to Valerio_Lyndon for mapping out much of the site earlier in previous dark themes. I used a file with your name on it to get this started and it was a giant help in the beginning. Thanks and credit to ShaggyZE for any work you may have put into the file I used as well.

Colors were inspired in part by cicerakes dark mode (my preferred theme for years) and the Dark Reader extension, although I've made mine darker and added lots of other changes.
